title: Chapter 165
body:
Chapter 165


For our Miss Zhao, this one hundred RMB red packet was nothing; it was equivalent to one RMB given by those average person. It was just to announce her presence


Since Zhao Youyue first joined the book friend group with the pen name of “I’m the best” and then this group, she had already evolved from a goofy-cutie amateur into an experienced reader.


Sometimes, she still liked to browse through those miscellaneous groups, but she seldom did so after entering senior high due to time insufficiency. [So-called lady] with the group number: 272077752 was the best! It consisted of friendly sisters. She hoped to become their bestie and travel together someday.


After the “I really like this work!” slogan red packets was sent out, several group members appeared out of sudden in that “dead group.” Of course, Leng Zi was the fastest one.


Always known as someone with “sharp eyes and agile hands [1]”, Han Leng was dumbfounded as he was only able to snatch a red packet of “25.8 [2]”.


It was once hard for him to even grab a one RMB red packet in his “Web Game: Conquering the World” book group. But, now, this was a twenty plus RMB one. This was totally a big bumper red packet!


A bitter smile curved his lips when he recalled her status of a rich man’s daughter. That’s right, this fella was inhumane, having no sense of presence in reality, but not on the internet.


This quite matched with the setting of the heroine, “Lin Meiyue,” of his new novel. She was passive in taking the initiative to talk with the male protagonist, Gu Yuan, but not in WeChat.


Han Leng immediately sent out an emoticon of “worshiping the boss,” kneeling and licking Miss Zhao’s boots, following with a message “Thank you, Godly Tycoon! ”


Other group members were amazed by her action which was really like that of a boss. She had spontaneously given out the red packets, each worth one hundred RMB. So generous!


Being adored by the members and showered by the gratitude from Leng Zi, it made her extremely happy.


She could not help it. She naturally adored the author of the work that she liked, and the feeling doubled after knowing that Leng Zi was a female. Compared to the male author, this would give them more mutual topics of interests.


Spurred by such emotions, Zhao Youyue sent a 200 RMB red packet again but, this time, it was exclusively for Leng Zi. This was the highest possible amount of a QQ red packet.


Han Leng’s agility at grabbing red packet was at auto-pilot, in fear of reading that one, heart-wrenching phrase—-


You are late, I’m all finished~


He gasped when he looked at this red packet. This Miss Zhao is such a willful person.


Honestly, Leng Zi was reluctant to receive her red packet. It felt as if he would place himself in her debt.


Actually, he felt terrible after he began avoiding Zhao Youyue. He felt helpless and, at the same time, utterly hopeless.


Writing was the only way for him to make up for the regret.


Revealing his identity was impossible, as he was still masquerading as the hipster female author, “Leng Zi.” Therefore, he could only keep expressing his gratitude to Zhao Youyue in this way. On the other hand, other members were commenting that said—


“Leng Zi, looks like this fan truly loves you!”


“The highest valued bumper red packet This is my first time seeing one, I am so jealous of you!”


“Could it be the legendary [You Yue] Tycoon? Tsk, never thought that [You Yue] Tycoon, famous Tycoon reader of Qi Dian, would read physical novels.”


“See through.jpg”


“Leng Zi, please reveal a picture of yourself, your voice, your body measurements. This ‘true love’ fan is so supportive!”


“Why not ask [You Yue] Tycoon to reveal itself?”


As an experienced reader, she was not as shy as before while being ridiculed. This time, she chuckled and, by using voice message, gently said “I do not mind as long as Leng Zi reveals the picture of herself. I guess that Leng Zi must be pretty!”


All of sudden, Zhao Youyue’s gentle and soothing voice made the group flutter to life.


“Wow, [You Yue] Tycoon really is a girl! He voice sounds good too! Apparently, the rumor is true, that [You Yue] is not only a rich man’s daughter, but a very pretty lady!”


“I sincerely think that her voice is nice. I’ve known that she must be gorgeous, just by listening to her voice!”


“Miss Youyue, do you still need any leg pendants [3]?”


“I would like to ask Miss Zhao this: How is your daily life as a noble?”


“Miss Zhao has revealed her voice. How about you, Leng Zi?”


At this moment, Han Leng began come down with cold sweat. All of this was obtuse. Zhao Youyue is such a bastard!


This would make him look very passive. Why must he reveal his voice? If he does so, everyone will know that he is a man.


No way!


He can’t afford to have his cover blown, especially not when he was still unsure about Zhao Youyue’s overall impression on this work. However, a preliminary conclusion can be drawn. She probably tilted more on the positive side, based on the red packet that had been given exclusively to “Leng Zi.”


However, knowing that was useless. That day, after seeing her read it seriously, he had guessed that Zhao Youyue should approve of his work.


This definitely gave him some pleasure and had boosted his motivation in writing. As he has said before, one day, he would make Zhao Youyue tip him voluntarily. Now, that desire has been fulfilled


Nevertheless, Han Leng was still eager to know her overall impression of his work. The word “Good” was not sufficient.


Moreover, he was not cool with the male members who were insanely trying to hook up with her. Although he was the one who avoided her at first, he had not been prepared for this. He could not stand other guys approaching her!


So, he decided to use his secret weapon—voice changer. That’s right, this incredible software can turn a lolita’s voice into an uncle’s voice, and a man’s voice into a woman’s voice!


Helplessly, he felt like he had fallen into the chasm of ” Nv Zhung Da Lao.”


Han Leng, no, “Leng Zi” replied by saying “Let’s just skip the picture of myself. Everyone should be more interested in my work, rather than my average look”


The voice changer turned his voice into a lady’s voice that sounded indifferent and pompous, like a cold, arrogant goddess.


Translation Note:


1. Sharp eyes and agile hands () is a Chinese proverb someone who is alert and agile in carrying out one’s duties.


2. 25.8 is a Chinese internet slang for loving me ().


3. Leg pendant () is a Chinese internet slang referring to a person who would like to hug another person’s thigh.
